channel.title: WWE Watch Guide on bumpXfeed
channel.description: Recent content in WWE Watch Guide on bumpXfeed

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions about the Match Quality Index (MQI)
item.description: Looking for the best WWE, AEW, Impact, TNA, ROH and more... matches to watch? Look no further than the Match Quality Index (MQI)! The MQI is a comprehensive metric that combines match rating and match length to provide a holistic assessment of the quality of each bout. By factoring in both subjective and objective measures, the MQI provides a more nuanced understanding of match quality, ensuring that you don't miss out on hidden gems or overhype over less-than-stellar performances.

item.title: WWE Crown Jewel 2023: The Best and Worst Matches to Watch
item.description: WWE Crown Jewel 2023 was a spectacular event that featured some of the best matches of the year. However, not all matches were created equal, and some of them were not worth your time. In this blog post, we will use a metric called the Match Quality Index (MQI) to rank the matches from best to worst, and give you our recommendations on which ones to watch and which ones to skip.
